name: C:\\Computer Crisis!\
description:
HACKERS DON'T PLAY FAIR

Computer Crisis is a satirical educational game that focuses on cybersecurity.

An evil foe has taken over your P.C. and you are at their will!

Complete their Hacker Challenges in order to gain your data back...

... OR NOT!

Credits:

Code, Art Assets: Myself

Music: Carnotaurus Team (FreeSound.org)
